jmf.discovery.implementation

Class PeerRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmf.discovery.implementation.PeerRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPeerRegistry

    public class PeerRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPeerRegistry
    The PeerRegistry keeps track of every module in the network. It tracks their state and is able to provide information about all those modules. Implements IPeerRegistry to offer access to peer data. Created on 7/30/15. Modified on 08/06/15
    Author:
    Jonas Grunert, Tobias Korb

        public java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap<ModuleUniqueId,ModuleHandle> INTERNAL_getAllPeers(boolean onlyActivePeers)

        Returns:
        Reference to map with all peers by Id
